comment: She's a little odd and always seems uncomfortable, but is friendly none the less.  Her assignments are clear and pretty easy, and she grades fairly.  Attendance isn't THAT big of a deal, compared to other english classes. She's actually VERY intelligent and interesting...stay and chat with her and you'll see.

This is a great professor, even though she is a LITTLE odd. Attendance is required by the department, not the professor. Just go to class, and she practically spells out what she expects from students.

She is a little peculiar, I have to admit that.  But she does gives so much input what she expects from you, so follow that and you will do great.  She would sound as if she grades harsh, but in the end, she gives extra opportunity so an A is attainable, with work of course.  Try to enjoy her unusal sense of humor, she is not mean. Helpful, actuall
You might think she is a little odd at first, but she is a lot of fun. she is a very good teacher.
